doc:
Gene Malin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gene_Malin 0 Gene Malin (June 30, 1908 – August 10, 1933), also known by stage names Jean Malin and Imogene Wilson, was an American actor, emcee, and drag performer during the Jazz Age. He was one of the first openly gay performers in Prohibition-era Speakeasy culture. Gene_Malin ( June_30_,_1908 – August_10_,_1933 ) , also_known by stage_names_Jean_Malin and Imogene_Wilson , was an_American_actor , emcee , and drag_performer during the_Jazz_Age . He was one of the_first_openly_gay_performers in Prohibition-era_Speakeasy_culture .
